The five ways in which others might crit: Their speech may be timely or untimely
Their speech may be true or false
Their speech may be gentle or harsh
Their speech may be beneficial or harmful
Their speech may be from a heart of love or from secret hate
The training to remain unaffected by cri: We will blurt out no bad words
We will remain full of compassion, with a heart of love and no secret hate
We will meditate spreading a heart of love to that person
